price: Ni vyake viliomo mbinguni, na viliomo katika ardhi. Na Yeye ndiye Mtukufu, Mkuu.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
footnotes: Ni vya Mwenyezi Mungu, peke yake, vyote viliomo katika mbingu na ardhi, kwa kuviumba, kuvimilika, na kuviendesha. Naye ni peke yake aliye tukuka kwa nafsi, na ukawa mkuu ufalme wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿaliyu al-ʿaẓīmu
